section.heading: Establishment of agency agreements between affiliated depository institutions.
section.text: A District state bank that is a subsidiary of a bank holding company may agree to receive deposits, renew time deposits, close loans, service loans, receive payments on loans and other obligations, and perform such other services as the Superintendent [Commissioner] may determine are appropriate, as an agent for a depository institution affiliate.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 26-735 and § 26-738.
